channel.title: Comments on: Steamed Barbecued Pork Buns – Char Siu Bao

item.title: By: marcellina
item.dc:creator: marcellina
item.description: I too, made chinese steamed pork buns for Chinese New Year. Aren't they so yum! Yours look delicious. Well done!
item.content:encoded: I too, made chinese steamed pork buns for Chinese New Year. Aren’t they so yum! Yours look delicious. Well done!

item.title: By: Sweets at Vicky's
item.dc:creator: Sweets at Vicky's
item.description: Gong Hei Fatt Choy! I love how you even made the barbeque pork yourself! I woiuld have probably bought it and eaten half of it before it even makes it into the buns... :)
item.content:encoded: Gong Hei Fatt Choy! I love how you even made the barbeque pork yourself! I woiuld have probably bought it and eaten half of it before it even makes it into the buns… ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Conor @ HoldtheBeef
item.dc:creator: Conor @ HoldtheBeef
item.description: I am SO impressed that you managed to actually have any pork leftover to make the buns, it looks so delicious I wouldn't be able to stop myself eating the whole lot as it is! Still, I'm glad you did - those buns look fantastic :)
item.content:encoded: I am SO impressed that you managed to actually have any pork leftover to make the buns, it looks so delicious I wouldn’t be able to stop myself eating the whole lot as it is! Still, I’m glad you did – those buns look fantastic ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Juliana
item.dc:creator: Juliana
item.description: Wow, you made these buns from the scratch? Nice! They buns look delicious...great job :-)
item.content:encoded: Wow, you made these buns from the scratch? Nice! They buns look delicious…great job ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: bake in paris
item.dc:creator: bake in paris
item.description:
Happy Chinese New Year! Gong Xi Fat Choi!
These bbq pork buns are so fluffy and delicious! That makes me so home-sick already :-)
Sawadee from bangkok, Kris
item.content:encoded:
Happy Chinese New Year! Gong Xi Fat Choi!

These bbq pork buns are so fluffy and delicious! That makes me so home-sick already ðŸ™‚

Sawadee from bangkok,
Kris

item.title: By: Jeanne
item.dc:creator: Jeanne
item.description: I love pork buns! This is a great tutorial, and all the photos are excellent!
item.content:encoded: I love pork buns! This is a great tutorial, and all the photos are excellent!

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Wow! Is that ever impressive! I love the caramelized pork and the buns look delicious! Why can't you be my neighbor???
item.content:encoded: Wow! Is that ever impressive! I love the caramelized pork and the buns look delicious! Why can’t you be my neighbor???

item.title: By: Amy @ cookbookmaniac.com
item.dc:creator: Amy @ cookbookmaniac.com
item.description: Gung Hei Fat Choi! This looks so amazing. I just wanted to reach out and grab one of them, too bad the monitor got in my way. :D
item.content:encoded: Gung Hei Fat Choi! This looks so amazing. I just wanted to reach out and grab one of them, too bad the monitor got in my way. ðŸ˜€

item.title: By: Alloronan
item.dc:creator: Alloronan
item.description: Oh man, steamed pork buns make me melt a little on the inside. Definitely going to try these, they look great!
item.content:encoded: Oh man, steamed pork buns make me melt a little on the inside. Definitely going to try these, they look great!

item.title: By: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.dc:creator: Arwen from Hoglet K
item.description: Great job bbqing your own pork - it looks lovely and shiny! It's cool that your buns are yeasted too.
item.content:encoded: Great job bbqing your own pork – it looks lovely and shiny! It’s cool that your buns are yeasted too.
